metadata.name: Core Equipment - Miller's Daughter POC
metadata.description: V2 Equipment System: Investigation and travel tools with EnabledActions
metadata.author: Wayfarer Team

items.name: Sturdy Rope
items.description: A coil of well-made hemp rope, about 30 feet long. Essential for climbing, securing loads, and crossing water hazards.
items.mechanicalEffect: Enables safe approaches to water crossings, climbing challenges, and descents into dangerous areas. Required for several investigation choices.
items.narrativeDescription: Good rope is the difference between calculated risk and foolhardy danger.

items.name: Oil Lantern
items.description: A reliable oil lantern with glass sides and a brass frame. Provides steady light in dark places.
items.mechanicalEffect: Required for investigating dark areas, upper floors, basements, and caves. Enables visibility-dependent investigation choices.
items.narrativeDescription: Light reveals truth in abandoned places.

items.name: Iron Pry Bar
items.description: A heavy iron bar, about two feet long. Useful for forcing stuck doors, prying up floorboards, and leveraging heavy objects.
items.mechanicalEffect: Enables forceful approaches to locked or stuck obstacles. Can damage stealth but provides alternative access.

items.name: Lockpick Set
items.description: A set of fine metal picks in a leather case. For those who prefer quiet entry to forced doors.
items.mechanicalEffect: Enables stealthy access to locked areas. Requires Cunning stat for success. Silent alternative to forcing entry.
items.narrativeDescription: A skilled hand makes locks mere suggestions.

items.name: Sturdy Leather Boots
items.description: Well-made traveling boots with reinforced soles. Protect feet from rough terrain and provide good traction.
items.mechanicalEffect: Reduces stamina cost for difficult travel routes. Provides protection from minor foot injuries.
items.narrativeDescription: Good footwear is the foundation of successful travel.

items.name: Warm Wool Cloak
items.description: A thick woolen cloak with a hood. Keeps out rain and cold.
items.mechanicalEffect: Reduces health loss from cold and wet conditions during travel and investigation.
items.narrativeDescription: Warmth and dryness preserve both health and morale.

items.name: Investigator's Satchel
items.description: A leather satchel with multiple compartments and reinforced straps. Designed for carrying tools and discoveries without damage.
items.mechanicalEffect: Increases inventory capacity by 2 and prevents fragile items from breaking during travel.
items.narrativeDescription: What good is a discovery if you can't bring it back intact?

items.name: Mother's Journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal filled with Elena's mother's handwriting. Chronicles the mill's final months and House Thorne's pressure.
items.mechanicalEffect: Key quest item. Can be shared with Elena or Martha to unlock conversations and responses. Contains evidence of House Thorne's actions.
items.narrativeDescription: The words of the dead carry weight the living cannot ignore.

items.name: Mill Ownership Deed
items.description: The legal deed to the old mill, signed and sealed. Names Elena's mother as rightful owner, inherited from her father.
items.mechanicalEffect: Proves Elena's legal ownership of the mill and surrounding land. Can be used in conversations with authorities or House Thorne representatives.
items.narrativeDescription: Paper and ink can be mightier than stone and mortar.

items.name: Travel Rations
items.description: Dried meat, hard cheese, and bread. Not delicious but filling and long-lasting.
items.mechanicalEffect: Reduces hunger by 25 when consumed. Essential for extended travel or investigation.
items.narrativeDescription: Function over flavor for the traveling investigator.
